summary:
A character save that you can use if you have the mod "Enhanced Character" edit.
Une sauvegarde d'un personnage que vous pouvez utilisez si vous avez le mod "Enhanced Character edit".
descriptionHtml:
This preset gives you a good base for making a good character. Don't hesitate to modify that preset for creating a character who suits to your taste.

[color=red][size=20]How to use it:[/size][/color]

To use it, download & install Enhanced Character Edit, then trake one of my file ( _x_commonTriRaces.slot ) and drop it into your "My documents/My games/Skyrim/CME_save" folder.
Elrinne is a nord, I don't know if it matters.

Pour l'utiliser, télécharger & installez Enhanced Character Edit puis prenez l'un de mes fichiers et déplacez le dans le dossier "Mes documents/My games/Skyrim/CME_save".
Elrinne est une nordique, je ne sais pas si la race est importante pour le preset.

[color=red][size=20]Recommended mod:[/size][/color]

[color=yellow][size=5]Body[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/? ]UNPB[/url]

[color=yellow][size=5]Hair[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
+ some hairpack by ZZJAY (loverslab) + SG hair pack by HelloSanta (They are not on the nexus)

[color=yellow][size=5]Texture[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows - High Resolution[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Femal texture Renewal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346/?]Smile[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female facial animations[/url]

Note:
-French is my first language, if I commits some english mystakes, don't hesitate to tell me.
author: YoshimitsuYamada
